translation.Message_0_Page_0: There's four materials that you can build your base out of: wood, bricks, metal and adamantine. Each of those materials is considerably stronger than the previous.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: Wood is obtained by chopping down trees, preferably with an axe. Clay can be found underwater and harvested with a shovel, you will need to smelt it in order to create bricks.
translation.Message_0_Page_2: Both of the metal types can be obtained by mining. Standard metal can also commonly be salvaged from various items.
